description:
Fix bug that prevented the gofmt test script being run on more
than one explicitly named file.

messages.text:
Hello rsc (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=d84ead90051f ***

Fix bug that prevented the gofmt test script being run on more
than one explicitly named file.

R=rsc, gri
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/186095

Committer: Robert Griesemer <gri@golang.org>

subject: code review 186095: Fix bug that prevented the gofmt test script being run ...
